task.title: Install the Test Suite Collection Scheduler plugin

taskbody.context: To enable Test Suite Scheduling View in Katalon Studio, you need to install the Test Suite Collection Scheduler plugin.

step.cmd: Go to Katalon Store and install this plugin: Test Suite Collection Scheduler.
Open Katalon Studio and go to Account > Reload Plugins

taskbody.result: The Test Suite Collection Scheduler plugin is installed successfully.
